ie.gmit.encode

Class EncoderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.encode.EncoderFactory

  • public class EncoderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for generating different algorithms' encoders. Can be call by
    EncoderFactory ef = EncoderFactory.getInstance();
    Encoder en = ef.getEncoder("Huffman"); //return a Huffman Encoder that can process String only.
    en = ef.getFileEncoder("Huffman"); //return a Huffman Encoder that can process Files.
    en = ef.getURLEncoder("Huffman"); //return a Huffman Encoder that can process URLs.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Chengxuan Xing

      • getEncoder

        public Encoder getEncoder(java.lang.String command)
                   throws CommandException
        Get a specific algorithm Encoder by specific command.
        Parameters:
        command - A string use to generate specific Encoder.
        "LempelZiv" for LempelZivEncoder
        "Huffman" for HuffmanEncoder
        "RunLength" for RunlengthEncoder
        "Base64" for Base64Encoder
        Returns:
        A specific Encoder.
        Throws:
        CommandException

      • getFileEncoder

        public Encoder getFileEncoder(java.lang.String command)
                       throws CommandException
        Get a specific algorithm FileEncoder by specific command.
        Parameters:
        command - A string use to generate specific algorithm FileEncoder.
        "LempelZiv" for Lempel-Ziv LZ78 FileEncoder.
        "Huffman" for Huffman FileEncoder.
        "RunLength" for Run-Length FileEncoder.
        "Base64" for Base64 FileEncoder.
        Returns:
        A specific FileEncoder.
        Throws:
        CommandException

      • getURLEncoder

        public Encoder getURLEncoder(java.lang.String command)
                      throws CommandException
        Get a specific algorithm URLEncoder by specific command.
        Parameters:
        command - A string use to generate specific algorithm URLEncoder .
        "LempelZiv" for Lempel-Ziv LZ78 URLEncoder.
        "Huffman" for Huffman URLEncoder.
        "RunLength" for Run-Length URLEncoder.
        "Base64" for Base64 URLEncoder.
        Returns:
        A specific FileEncoder.
        Throws:
        CommandException
